content.en: Autism diagnosis: Researchers have been exploring the use of machine learning algorithms to improve the early detection and diagnosis of Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD). Various algorithms such as k-Nearest Neighbours, Support Vector Machine, Random Forests, and logistic regression analysis have been employed to classify ASD data and screen for autism. These machine learning techniques show promise in automating the diagnosis of ASD in different age groups and improving the accuracy of detection in children, adolescents, and toddlers.
content.da: Autisme diagnose: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at forbedre tidlig opsporing og diagnose af autismespektrumforstyrrelse (ASF). Forskellige algoritmer som k-nærmeste naboer, Support Vector Machine, Random Forests og logistisk regressionsanalyse er blevet anvendt til at klassificere ASF-data og screene for autisme. Disse maskinlæringsteknikker viser lovende resultater i automatisk diagnose af ASF i forskellige aldersgrupper og forbedrer nøjagtigheden af påvisning hos børn, unge og småbørn.
